info.title: Open a menu to the last item

references.linkText: APG Example: Actions Menu Button  Using element.focus()

raw.name: JAWS
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the PC cursor is active, press <kbd>Escape</kbd> to activate the virtual cursor.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the virtual cursor is active, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>z</kbd> to disable the virtual cursor.

setupScript.scriptDescription: sets focus on the menu button
setupScript.name: setFocusOnMenuButton
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the menu button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#menubutton1').focus();

instructions.instructions: Starting at the 'Actions' menu button, open the menu.

pcCursor: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the virtual cursor is active, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>z</kbd> to disable the virtual cursor.

assertions.assertionStatement: Name of the focused item, 'Action 4', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey name of the focused item, 'Action 4'

assertions.assertionStatement: Role of the focused item, 'menu item', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey role of the focused item, 'menu item'

assertions.assertionStatement: Position of the focused item in the menu, '4', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey position of the focused item in the menu, '4'

assertions.assertionStatement: Number of items in the menu,'(4', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey number of items in the menu, '4'

assertions.assertionStatement: Name of the menu, 'Actions', is conveyed
